item.title: GOLDMAN's Solomon Says Market Greed Now Outpacing Fear...
item.description:
www.yahoo.com
Greed is outpacing fear in world financial markets as investors respond to the pandemic recovery, Goldman Sachs Chief Executive David Solomon says, adding that such periods of exuberance are usually not long-lived. The unprecedented levels of stimulus ordered by governments and central banks, he said, had led to exuberance in certain markets. Solomon said the expectation of rising interest rates could reduce the heat in some asset markets.
